mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_ID, CAMPAIGN_ID, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_FLAG, PRODUCT_REAL_NAME, GROUP_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE) VALUES (#{productId}, #{campaignId}, #{productNo}, #{productName}, #{productFlag}, #{productRealName}, #{groupName}, #{productPrice}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_REAL_NAME = #{productRealName}, GROUP_NAME = #{groupName}
